description:
Welcome to Melbet – the top choice for betting and casino entertainment. Whether you're cheering for your favorite cricket team or spinning the reels for jackpot wins, Melbet brings real gaming excitement wherever you go.

Why Melbet?

For Sports Fans:

- Cricket, football, kabaddi, tennis & more – all with live, pre-match, and accumulator bets.
- One-click sign-up so you're in the game instantly.
- Localized payment options and superfast withdrawals.
- Special cricket promotions and loyalty rewards.

For Casino Players:

- Massive collection of slots: Aviator, Lucky Jet, Sweet Bonanza, and more.
- Real-dealer games 24/7: roulette, blackjack, teen patti.
- Generous welcome bonuses, daily free spins, and VIP rewards.
- Smooth, mobile-optimized interface built for fast fun.

Support That Never Sleeps:

- 24/7 customer support available via live chat and email.
- Multilingual agents ready to assist you anytime, day or night.
- Get help with payments, games, verification and more – fast and friendly!

Betting with betPawa is safe
We’ve got years of experience making customers smile. Deposits and withdrawals are fast, we pay winnings quickly and only use trusted mobile money services so your funds are safe at all times. If ever you have a problem, we’re here to talk however suits you best.

Customer care and trust
Part of making betting friendly is the dedication and focus we place on delivering the best customer service in the industry. We provide the exact help you need, at the exact moment you need it. Support is available every hour of every day. You can call, email, chat to us on Facebook Messenger and Telegram or even ask us to call you.

Helping to change lives
We love seeing the lives of customers and communities change for the better. Ambitious initiatives like Dream Maker (https://dreammaker.betpawa.com/) and Win BIG, Give Back, where we work closely with customers and communities to drive lasting change, are examples of projects that betPawa love to do.

Responsible Gambling
We believe in responsible gambling and want you to always enjoy playing with us by staying in control and only betting what you can afford. If you ever feel like gambling has become a problem, tell us and we’ll be in touch to help. If you would rather talk to independent specialists, we also provide contact information with local experts too.


Sports Betting
We offer betting markets on thousands of matches each week across all your favourite competitions, with a user-friendly interface so they're easy to find and bet on. You can bet on the match result, scorers, scoreline, number of goals/points and almost anything else you can think of.
We say “Bet Small, Win Big” because players can bet from as little as one pesewa to take advantage of our massive Win Bonus on eligible betslips with 3 legs or more, going up to 500% on betslips with 45 eligible legs.

Virtual Sports
Virtual sports betting works like traditional sports betting, but results are simulated using real data. There are 66 matches every 5 minutes and over 19,000 a day so you can bet at your convenience. betPawa’s Win Bonus is available whenever you bet on three or more eligible legs.

Games
You’ve got more opportunities than ever before to bet small and win BIG on betPawa Games. We have hundreds of games for you to play at any time from anywhere. They’re made for mobile, low on data usage and stakes, and fully certified to guarantee their fairness. Pick one and start playing.

Jackpots
betPawa offers two regular weekly Jackpots you can win BIG on. The weekend Pick17 - 1X2 Jackpot is your chance to turn a small ticket price into a huge jackpot prize. There are also consolation prizes for getting as many as four of the results wrong.

Pawa6
Pawa6 is a 100% free-to-play game that offers players a chance to win huge cash prizes, by correctly predicting the scorelines outcome of 6 football matches every two weeks. There are 5,000 guaranteed winners in every round. To play Pawa6, you just need a betPawa account. Sign up or sign in to betPawa, pick your Pawa6 username and start playing.


The betPawa brand is owned by Mchezo Limited.
© 2023 Mchezo, All rights reserved.

With over 20M active users and more than 2K competitions worldwide, you’ll have everything at your fingertips: live minute-by-minute match updates, personalised notifications for your favourite competitions, teams, and players, detailed stats, goals and the latest football news on transfers and the football market.

- News, signings, and transfer rumours.

We constantly enhance the app based on user suggestions and comments.

Watch live football matches on FIFA+ - Stream soccer matches, replays, highlights, scores, and exclusive content anytime, anywhere.
The FIFA+ app is your official home for live football, match replays and the game’s greatest stories. With a bold new design and powerful new features, FIFA+ brings you closer to the sport you love - From FIFA World Cup™ moments to live matches across the globe. This autumn, you can stream the FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™, FIFA U-17 Women’s World Cup Morocco 2025 and FIFA U-17 Men’s World Cup Quatar exclusively on Fifa+ in selected countries with many more competitions to come!

Live Football Streaming Worldwide
Stream thousands of live football matches from over 230 competitions and 100+ Football Associations. FIFA+ offers unrivalled coverage of men’s and women’s FIFA tournaments, youth competitions including the FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™ and FIFA World Cup™ Qualifiers in selected countries.
- Watch live football and soccer matches from around the world
- Follow the road to FIFA World Cup 26™ with live qualifiers and match highlights
- The official home of Classic FIFA World Cup™ matches and original documentaries
- Get live match updates, scores and kick-off alerts instantly

Match Replays, Highlights and FIFA World Cup™ Archive
Missed a game? Relive the match day action with full game replays, match highlights, and expert commentary. Re-watch iconic FIFA World Cup™ moments and explore the football archive to watch historic games and unforgettable goals! With in-depth highlights and detailed post-match analysis, you’ll never miss a thing.

Original Football Content and Stories
Go beyond the pitch with exclusive documentaries, player profiles and untold stories from around the world of football. Discover original series that dive into the stories of legendary players, rivalries and soccer teams from around the world.

Access premium content only available on FIFA+
- Match alerts and notifications: Never miss a goal or kick-off.
- Watch from the start: Rewind live tournament match streams so you can catch up on games
at your convenience.
- Watch next: Get automatic content suggestions tailored to your viewing.
- Improved search and filters: Easily find teams, matches, tournaments and highlights.
- Simple sign-in: Use your FIFA ID to unlock full access to the FIFA+ streaming app.

THE OFFICIAL FOOTBALL STREAMING APP BY FIFA
Stream live football, match replays and FIFA World Cup™ highlights right from your phone. FIFA+ is the only official FIFA app with exclusive access to tournaments and global
competitions.
Download the FIFA+ app today and stream live football, match highlights, documentaries and FIFA World Cup™ content - All in one place. Experience the world’s game, your way.

The official Jude Bellingham app has arrived.

Download now and stay connected to every moment.

À l'occasion des événements sportifs au Maroc, un écosystème numérique innovant a été développé pour offrir aux supporters, visiteurs, volontaires et organisateurs une expérience 100% digitalisée. L'application YALLA est le compagnon de l'ensemble des grands événements sportifs organisés ou coorganisé par la Fédération Royale Marocaine du Football au Maroc.
YALLA offre la possibilité de :
- Créer et gérer le FAN ID, indispensable pour accéder aux stades et Fan Zones
- Déposer une demande d'e-Visa en ligne si nécessaire.
- Accéder aux actualités, programmes et informations pratiques liées aux événements sportifs.
- Consulter les services liés à l'organisation : transport, hébergement et activités.
- Rester informé en temps réel des mises à jour officielles.
YALLA centralise tous les services numériques afin que chaque participant profite pleinement des compétitions sportives au Maroc.

The algorithm takes into account the history of the results of the teams, the state of recent form, head-2-head matches, home and away performances, statistical data of the reference league, any sidelined player, the fluctuation of odds (provided by an important bookmaker) and on the basis of these and other data elaborates the most likely outcome of each match.

In addition to the football tips of the algorithm, we also provide two bets of the day elaborated by our team of football betting experts: Doubling and Risk of the Day.
All the bet predictions are free!

--- LIVE AND PRE-MATCH SCANNER ---
BetMines scanners scan every second all football matches and send you alerts every time a match meets your criteria

--- TRENDS ---
Find statistical trends for the main events - like 1X2, Total Goals, Both team to score - for teams with matches in the coming days

--- SOCIAL FOOTBALL BETTING ---
Football betting becomes social!
You can follow the best tipsters in the application, copy their bets and become yourself a reference point for the community .

When you sign up you will receive 1000 virtual diamonds with which you can create virtual bets , both to test your gaming strategies and to challenge other tipsters and climb the rankings of the best tipsters of the day, week, month and ever.

The ranking is based on the profit generated by the tipster in the concerned period , so you can easily identify the best BetMines's tipster!
The best daily bets will be published on our social channels.
NB: You don't win any cash prizes, these are virtual bets ( and not real money ) with the aim of testing your gaming strategies and having fun at the same time!


--- TEAMS STATISTICS ---
For each team involved in the match we provide the results of the last 5 matches in general, the last 5 at home and the last 5 away games.
For the last 10 matches of each team we also provide:

- the percentage of results 1.5+,2.5+ and 3.5+ goals, Both team to score, 3 Way Result
- the mean of the corners
- Total goals
- Clean sheet matches

--- LEAGUE STATISTICS ---
For each league we supply:
- Standings
- Percentages of 1.5+,2.5+, 3.5+ goals and both team to score outcomes
- The minutes of the goals
- Average goal per game
- Average of yellow and red cards


--- BETMINES MACHINE ---
It is a tool that allows you to generate bets with a high probability of success taking into account the selected criteria.
You choose the leagues you want to bet on, the type of event (1X2, double chance, under/over , combo and both team to score), the desired odds range, the number of matches and BetMines will generate for you the most likely bet based on the criteria you have chosen.


--- OTHER FEATURES ---
- possibility to choose your favorite leagues
- possibility to follow the results live thanks to a livescore service
- possibility to access the best odds for each event
- possibility of receiving push notifications when our suggested bets are published, when a tipster you follow posts a bet or when the bet you placed is winning.

Follow BetMines football predictions, analyse the statistics provided, follow the best tipsters and create your own winning football bets for FREE!

Forebet - Mathematical football predictions, stats and scores, covering most football leagues from all around the world. 

Forebet in its core is a Predictive analytics tool, which uses Artificial Intelligence techniques to analyse past football data and calculate probabilities for future outcomes. 
It’s main goals are to deliver statistical insight by identifying patterns and trends in the enormous football data, to be easy to use,  to provide reliable and fast live score service and present in comprehensible manner the football statistical data. 

The Forebet key features include:

PREDICTIONS - A system for predicting football matches on the basis of statistics using complex mathematical algorithms. Probabilities are calculated for the final outcome of the match, goals scored, etc. The Forebet machine learning algorithms work on a huge database storing football data generated since year 2000. The results are then displayed in the app clearly in an easy to understand way.

STATISTICS - User friendly displayed statistical data for each match such as league standings, team form, last played matches results, head to head statistics between the match opponents, overall accumulated stats such as average scored or conceded goals, next matches opponents difficulty level calculated by an algorithm, which analyses the teams past performance.

LIVE SCORES - updating the matches scores while they are in-play with their interesting events by minute such as goalscorers, assist players, yellow or red cards, substitutions.

TRENDS - Standout statistical trends outlined and formed in a human readable text.

PREVIEWS - Unique match previews for some of the most interesting upcoming matches, created by our experienced editorial team.

FAVOURITES - Follow the matches that matter to you simply by tapping on the star button next to each prediction row or just follow an entire league by selecting it from the leagues menu as a favourite again by the star button.

ABOUT FOREBET
Forebet has been delivering its mathematical football predictions since 2009 when the first statistical model was created and uploaded online. Since then our team always worked passionately to improve and develop the system.
Forebet is and has always been free, delivering unique content to the football fans!
